required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment Patterns in Advanced Small Cell Lung Cancer (SCLC)
clinical_study.official_title: Treatment Patterns Among Patients With Advanced Small Cell Lung Cancer (SCLC) in Europe

brief_summary.textblock: Non-interventional, retrospective study of advanced SCLC patients in 4 European countries (France, Germany, Italy, and United Kingdom [UK]) with the aim to produce evidence across different SCLC treatment lines to characterize the clinical and economic burden of the disease in Europe.

primary_outcome.description: Characteristics include: Age/month and year of birth Gender Ethnicity Weight Height Smoking status Alcohol consumption Other relevant risk factors

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Patient Clinical Characteristics in Relapsed/refractory patients receiving second- or later-line treatment
primary_outcome.description: Characteristics include: Relevant comorbidities Laboratory parameters Date of initial diagnosis Staging using the VALG system Histology ECOG Performance status Tumor status Symptoms

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Patient Clinical Characteristics in patients with LD-SCLC
primary_outcome.description: Characteristics include: Relevant comorbidities Laboratory parameters Date of initial diagnosis Staging using the VALG system Histology ECOG Performance status Tumor status Symptoms

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Patient Clinical Characteristics in patients with ED-SCLC
primary_outcome.description: Characteristics include: Relevant comorbidities Laboratory parameters Date of initial diagnosis Staging using the VALG system Histology ECOG Performance status Tumor status Symptoms

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of treatment patterns in patients with ED-SCLC
primary_outcome.description: Details on patients prior treatment Patterns will be summarized using descriptive statistics

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of treatment patterns in patients with LD-SCLC
primary_outcome.description: Details on patients prior treatment Patterns will be summarized using descriptive statistics

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of treatment patterns in Relapsed/refractory patients receiving second- or later-line treatment
primary_outcome.description: Details on patients prior treatment Patterns will be summarized using descriptive statistics

secondary_outcome.measure: Composite of SCLC-related healthcare resource utilization (HCRU)
secondary_outcome.description: HCRU will include hospitalizations, emergency visits, outpatient visits, treatments received (including treatments prescribed to manage AEs), diagnostic tests and procedures, surgery, and ancillary services.

secondary_outcome.measure: Treatment-related adverse events (AEs) leading to discontinuation
Incidence of surgery as cancer-directed therapy
secondary_outcome.description: To describe the use of surgery in the management of LD-SCLC and ED-SCLC patients having relapsed

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of radiation therapy as cancer-directed therapy
secondary_outcome.description: To describe the use of radiation therapy in the management of LD-SCLC and ED-SCLC patients having relapsed
To describe the use of best supportive care (BSC) in the management of LD-SCLC and ED-SCLC patients having relapsed
To describe the use of palliative care in the management of LD-SCLC and ED-SCLC patients having relapsed

arm_group.description: patients with LD-SCLC receiving first-line treatment, including potential maintenance treatment
patients with ED-SCLC receiving first-line treatment, including potential maintenance treatment
relapsed/refractory patients receiving second- or later-line treatment

study_pop.textblock: Advanced SCLC patients in 4 European countries (France, Germany, Italy, and United Kingdom [UK]).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Cohort 1 and 2:
- Patients 18 years of age or older at SCLC diagnosis
- Confirmed diagnosis of SCLC within the patient identification period (between October 2013 and October 2015)
- Initiated on first-line treatment (radiotherapy and/or chemotherapy) for their SCLC
- Full oncology medical history for the mandatory variables of the study available in the participating center from day of diagnosis until the end of follow-up or death (whichever occurs first)
- Signed informed consent (where required as per local requirements)
Cohort 3:
- Patients 18 years of age or older at SCLC diagnosis
- Confirmed diagnosis of SCLC not earlier than October 2013
- Initiated on second-line treatment due to relapse after first-line therapy not later than August 2016
- Full oncology medical history for the mandatory variables of the study available in the participating center from day of diagnosis until the end of follow-up or death (whichever occurs first)
- Signed informed consent (where required as per local requirements)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with prior or concomitant malignancy (ie, cancer) other than SCLC
Other Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply
